column4: I want to know what version of some software I get before I run "apt-get install whatever" - Is there an easy way to do that?
I don't like to have to google my eyes out every time I want to know what I get
current version of wordpress in 11.10 is: Version: 3.0.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1  (ignore everything except the 3.0.5, which is the version of WP it is)
